content: this is a written pattern for how i crocheted my yarnaby plush it took roughly 7 days and i drafted the pattern myself the parts of the body are all done separately then sewn together while i chain stitched the mane directly onto the body the hard way but you could just attached separate yarn strands for an easier option you will need 13 different colors of worsted weight yarn light orange and peach for the body black and white for the face and light orange yellow green teal light blue blue purple light purple/pink red and orange for the mane you will also need polyfill stuffing a c/2 75 m hook and a darning needle
